name: ATM Simulator Cash and Money
description:
Does your kid love educational games and want to go to the ATM ?
Do you want to try the best ATM Simulator ?
If your child want to play with cash and money you have found the right educational game !
Let's go to help the bank customer !
This bank is so much fun ! Let's be the best ATM customer !

These kids need your help !

ATM Simulator Cash and Money is simple and fun :
* Open the game and choose the level that you want to play
* go to the bank and update your PIN
* go to the ATM to do some operations
* withdraw some money, a lot of money with your debit card !
* spend the money and buy all the toys

Today the bank is crowded, and the kids are waiting.

ATM Simulator Cash and Money is a must have app for kids. Features:
-game suitable for the whole family
-Optimized for tablets (Sony , Samsung, Kindle)
-entertaining and educational game
-easy to use
-simple and intuitive : just a few commands to use
-exercise your fine motor skills
-Promotes problem-solving skills and hand-eye coordination
-real life ATM activities, keep track of your checking account balance
-manage the credit card or debit card
-go to supermarket and do shopping in the toy shop
-learn how to use a bank account

Help your kids to learn and inspire your creativity and imagination in this ATM game !
Play with the best atm game for kids, learning about ATM machines is fun !
The kids need your help in this bank ! keep track of your checking account balance and cash balance !

Have fun with BATOKI !
developers: BATOKI - Best Apps for Toddlers and Kids
